main event: Two white or silver disc-shaped objects were observed over Oklahoma City for approximately 45 minutes before disappearing without apparent movement.
interesting points: The objects were the size of baseballs,The sighting was first noted by the witness's daughter,The objects maintained a fixed position despite being observed for 45 minutes,No sound was heard during the sighting,Two aircraft approached from the west shortly after the objects disappeared.
sighted object: two white or silver round disk objects
witness description: a government employee for CAA with flight facilities inspection experience
